input.sentences: [female] and [male] wanted a 1930s themed wedding and they got it .
right down to the vintage car that they posed in front of .
[male] 's buddy [male] took the pictures and he was great .
some | not all | of the wedding guests got into the 30s feel themselves .
but [male] and [female] seemed very happy and that 's what counted .
output.sentences: The groom thought it would be great to arrive in the old car as part of their wedding theme.
The couple posed in front of the vintage car.
The male taking the pictures is a buddy of the groom.
The wedding guests feel happy for the couple.
The wedding couple look to be very happy.
